name: City Wasp Life Simulator 3D
description:
Do you like animal simulators? Play City Wasp Life Simulator 3D and try to help a lonely insect to stay alive in a dangerous human city! Imagine you are a yellow jacket wasp in the city full of aggressive predators and human beings. You should protect your nest from aggressive spiders and strike back, revenging these people for your suffering!

So, be attentive and keep your sting alert - aggressive insects, such as bees, beetles, spiders or butterflies are nearby you. Moreover, you should use any opportunity of attacking citizens – they deserve it, you know! Don’t forget to mind your wasp’ health, energy, water and food indicators to survive - if one of it drops – there is no chance to stay alive!
Collect enough resources, earn points and upgrade your insect’s skills to be more effective in this epic struggle against humanity! Customize your wasp to make it the perfect killer!
Explore the modern city and get an unforgettable experience of micro world surviving with our City Wasp Life Simulator 3D game!

City Wasp Life Simulator 3D features:

Help the cute wasp to survive in big city
Feel like a part of the micro world full of angry insects
Use the points to upgrade your wasp
Enjoy realistic graphic with lifelike creatures
Stay alive as long as possible in this hostile human town

Become the bug from the giant microworld, run through the city streets and blocks to find food and water, fight against other aggressive insects, stay alive and return to your colony in City Wasp Life Simulator 3D game!
